next image?url https 3a 2f 2fapi.creerinfotech.com 2f 2fuploads 2fc v d9a8bdbe89.png w 640 q 75)2025-06-03 ketul chauhan 5 min case study: transforming dental imaging with ai a computer vision success project overview we recently had the opportunity to push the boundaries of healthcare innovation through a cutting-edge computer vision project focused on dental imaging. this end-to-end solution was designed to automate and optimize the process of analyzing dental impressions a crucial step in modern dental diagnostics and treatment planning. problem statement dental clinics and labs often work with a high volume of images, but: - manual inspection is time-consuming and error-prone. - image quality varies, affecting diagnostic accuracy. - detecting dental impressions requires expert intervention. we set out to build a fully automated, intelligent system to improve speed, accuracy, and consistency in dental image analysis. solution delivered we engineered an ai-powered workflow with the following components. 1 . dental impression object detection using deep learning-based detection models (such as yolo and efficientdet), we trained the system to accurately identify dental impressions in various image conditions. the model was fine-tuned on a diverse dataset, achieving high precision and recall scores in detecting impressions amidst complex backgrounds. 2 . image quality assessment to ensure diagnostic-grade results, we integrated an image quality evaluator that analysed. - sharpness: using edge detection and focus metrics. - brightness: normalizing underexposed or overexposed images. - only images meeting the quality threshold progressed to the next step, ensuring consistent outputs and reducing false positives. 3 . end-to-end automation pipeline from the moment an image is uploaded, our system: - validates and enhances image quality. - detects the presence of dental impressions. - flags any issues for review. - outputs results in a standardised format. all this happens without manual intervention, drastically reducing turnaround time. impact benefits - efficiency boost: reduced processing time by 75 . - high accuracy: 95 precision in detecting valid impressions. - consistency: automated quality control ensures uniform diagnostic standards. - scalability: the pipeline can handle hundreds of images per hour with minimal hardware. collaboration teamwork this project was a true testament to team collaboration and interdisciplinary expertise combining data science, machine learning, software engineering, and dental imaging knowledge. ! exploring the power of ai chatbots in e-commerce (https: creerinfotech.com next image?url https 3a 2f 2fapi.creerinfotech.com 2f 2fuploads 2ffreepik the style is candid image manual inspection is time-consuming and error-prone. - image quality varies, affecting diagnostic accuracy. - detecting dental impressions requires expert intervention. we set out to build a fully automated, intelligent system to improve speed, accuracy, and consistency in dental image analysis. solution delivered we engineered an ai-powered workflow with the following components. 1 . dental impression object detection using deep learning-based detection models (such as yolo and efficientdet), we trained the system to accurately identify dental impressions in various image conditions. the model was fine-tuned on a diverse dataset, achieving high precision and recall scores in detecting impressions amidst complex backgrounds. 2 . image quality assessment to ensure diagnostic-grade results, we integrated an image quality evaluator that analysed. - sharpness: using edge detection and focus metrics. - brightness: normalizing underexposed or overexposed images. - only images meeting the quality threshold progressed to the next step, ensuring consistent outputs and reducing false positives. 3 . end-to-end automation pipeline from the moment an image is uploaded, our system: - validates and enhances image quality. - detects the presence of dental impressions. - flags any issues for review. - outputs results in a standardised format. all this happens without manual intervention, drastically reducing turnaround time. impact benefits - efficiency boost: reduced processing time by 75 . - high accuracy: 95 precision in detecting valid impressions. - consistency: automated quality control ensures uniform diagnostic standards. - scalability: the pipeline can handle hundreds of images per hour with minimal hardware. collaboration teamwork this project was a true testament to team collaboration and interdisciplinary expertise combining data science, machine learning, software engineering, and dental imaging knowledge. ! exploring the power of ai chatbots in e-commerce (https: creerinfotech.com next image?url https 3a 2f 2fapi.creerinfotech.com 2f 2fuploads 2ffreepik the style is candid image photography with natural 50483 5888855b14.png w 640 q 75) ketul chauhan 5 min exploring the power of ai chatbots in e-commerce ! how devops saved the day (https: creerinfotech.com next image?url https 3a 2f 2fapi.creerinfotech.com 2f 2fuploads 2freact js 6f04ac2b88.png w 640 q 75) ketul chauhan 4 min how devops saved the day ! case study: transforming dental imaging with ai a computer vision success (https: creerinfotech.com next image?url https 3a 2f 2fapi.creerinfotech.com 2f 2fuploads 2fc v d9a8bdbe89.png w 640 q 75)2025-06-03 ketul chauhan 5 min case study: transforming dental imaging with ai a computer vision success project overview we recently had the opportunity to push the boundaries of healthcare innovation through a cutting-edge computer vision project focused on dental imaging. this end-to-end solution was designed to automate and optimize the process of analyzing dental impressions a crucial step in modern dental diagnostics and treatment planning. problem statement dental clinics and labs often work with a high volume of images, but: -
